title: Sr Software Engineer - Java EE & Microservices
full_description: Description Robert Half is looking for a hands-on Senior Software Engineer - "Java EE & Microservices" who can independently contribute to the vision of a Microservice architecture, evangelizing across team on technologies, and leading the service development effort for the Search Experience team. The ideal candidate is an experienced engineer with proven tracking record of delivering high quality services in a cloud platform, AWS preferred, and passionate about building the best possible technical solutions for customer problems. If you are available and interested, please apply to the job post and contact Suman Sandhu at 408-271-9063Requirements BS/MS in Computer Science or related field. 5+ years software engineering experience, with 3+ years of such experience in an agile environment. Excellent written, verbal and interpersonal communication skills. Strong experience in Java EE or Spring Framework. Strong experience with Cloud technologies, AWS preferred. Strong Experience with developing and integrating with microservices. Strong Experience building applications on Search technology, Solr preferred. Experience delivering high performance, scalable and mission-critical software in a cloud environment. Plus: + AWS Certification is a big plus. Experience in Node.js. Experience with Service Discovery solutions. Experience with building platform serviced for internal and external developers.
